email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $50.25? The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.25 is acceptable, provided we can lock in the laycan as 15-20 October. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day, with half rate for despatch? Let’s finalize this soon. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, that works for us. Laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and demurrage is capped at $20,000 per day with half rate for despatch. I’ll send over the recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let’s catch up soon over a call. Best regards, Sarah.
